experiences.title: CTO - Farazin
experiences.description: Leader of development team , schema designer and Back-End developer Our target is making automate all actions in factory , such asadministrative affairs, production planning, accounting and warehousing, production line monitoring .

experiences.title: CTO - Kelaasor
experiences.description: Kelaasor.com is a platform to buy and sell academic contents like articles and leaflets . I was the project's CTO and we developed that with Laravel . Speed, security and SEO were the most important features of first version , and I'm glad we were able to release web application before deadline .

experiences.title: Founder - Darchin
experiences.description: Darchin was an API based online food ordering system that developed with Laravel and Vuejs . In addition to managing the team , i was Back-End developer ( Laravel ) and Schema Designer . I developed API based system with a complete document for other developers .

experiences.title: CEO - Tinab Company
experiences.description: Tinab is a startup company that located in science and technology park . I was CEO and Chairman of the Board and we developed "Darchin" -online food ordering system- & "Teroject" -Online team and project management system- and "Farazin DSP system" -manage production line and warehousing in Farazin company in Tehran- in this company .

experiences.title: Founder - Teroject
experiences.description: Teroject is a huge platform to manage business and control teams , projects and customers. ( the word of teroject comes from team and project )

experiences.title: Full Stack - Artak
experiences.description: Develop a web application for ISP for manage and direct employees towards internet customers with warehousing and accounting and CRM

experiences.title: Founder - Webran
experiences.description: Webran is a Social Network for Students & Employee of Shahrood University .
